Section.Title: Philosophy
Section.Para: This package determines the rank and the (G)-orbit of tensors in the 18-dimensional vector space V = Fq2 ⋆ Fq3 ⋆ Fq3, over the finite field Fq with q elements, where G ≤ GL(18, q) is the natural group preserving the set of tensors of rank one in V.

The algorithms depend on the classification of 2 × 3 × 3 tensors. The code is written in the GAP language and uses functionality from the GAP package FinInG. Tensors are represented by points in the projective space PG(V).

Section.Title: How to cite T233
Section.Para: For citing T233, refer to the authors: Nour Alnajjarine and Michel Lavrauw. The official package and paper can be found at: https://osebje.famnit.upr.si/~michel.lavrauw/T233/T233_paper.html

Section.Title: Overview of this manual
Section.Para: The manual introduces T233 and describes its auxiliary and main tools for analyzing 2x3x3-tensors over finite fields.
